title: One dead, three hurt in Lynchburg shooting
content:
LYNCHBURG, Va. (WDBJ7) Lynchburg Police responded to shots fired near 421 Rivermont Avenue, by the Ellington Building.
When officers arrived, they found four victims that had been shot.
Shawn Johnson, Jr., 21, received a gunshot wound to the torso. He was later pronounced dead at the hospital.
Kevin Foxx, 30, was shot several times. He is listed in critical condition.
Both Jamall Randolph, 28, and Angelena Garland, 25, received non-life threatening gunshot wounds.
Witnesses say the shots came from a dark colored 4-door sedan with an unknown license number.
No arrests have been made at this time.
